alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Menifee; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:17AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Morgan, east central Menifee, northwestern Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 117 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kellacey, or 7 miles west of West Liberty, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Twentysix around 120 AM EDT. Omer, Ezel and Pomp around 125 AM EDT. West Liberty, Henry, New Cummer, Pekin, Woodsbend, Liberty Road and Licking River around 130 AM EDT. Grassy Creek, Mize, Greear and Index around 135 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Murphyfork, Malone, Gordon Ford, Demund, Nickell, Lizzielane, Rexville, Panama, Stacy Fork, Hazel Green, Well Station, White Oak, Lewis, Sellars, Payton, Daysboro, Williams, Helechawa, Cannel City, Lower Gilmore, Caney and Holliday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
